name: Screw It!
description:
You are typical office work-man in typical office work-man environment. It is job of work-man to nail and screw. Stop flailing arms and start work!!! A QWOP inspired game where you take control of a bumbling assembly line worker who has to grasp at the right tools in order to progress with his job.

Instructions:

 Use the QWIOASKL keys to control your character's arms and try to nail and screw things around! 

Nail it-> use hammer on a nail over the plank.
Screw it -> use wrench on a screw over the plank.

Replay against the timer for a better score.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020.

Kremlin Font : www.vicfieger.com/ (www.1001freefonts.com/kremlin.font)
